mapper.select: SELECT a.id id, a.role_name roleName, a.role_code roleCode FROM tb_system_role a inner join tb_user_role b on a.id = b.role_id where b.user_id = #{userId} and a.status = 1

select a.id authorityId, a.authority authority from tb_system_authority a
AND a.status = 1

select a.id authorityId, a.authority authority, b.id id, b.menu_name menuName, b.menu_code menuCode, b.menu_desc menuDesc, b.pid pid, b.scheme scheme, b.target target, b.sort sort, b.level level, b.remark remark, b.url url, b.icon icon from tb_system_authority a inner join tb_system_menu b on a.menu_id = b.id
AND a.status = 1 and b.status = 1
select a.id authorityId, a.authority authority from tb_system_authority a inner join tb_authority_role b on a.id = b.authority_id where b.role_id = #{roleId} and a.status = 1

selecta.id authority_id authorityId, a.authority authority, c.id id, c.menu_name menuName, c.menu_code menuCode, c.menu_desc menuDesc, c.pid pid, c.scheme scheme, c.target target, c.sort sort, c.level level, c.remark remark, c.url url, c.icon icon from tb_system_authority a inner join tb_authority_role b on a.id = b.authority_id inner join tb_system_menu c on c.id = a.menu_id where b.role_id = #{roleId} and a.status = 1 and c.status = 1
